thread.title: Subway lose court case over sandwich size
thread.title_full: Subway lose court case over sandwich size

title: Subway lose court case over sandwich size
text:
Subway lose court case over sandwich size 
Breaking News.ie Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Subway has agreed to start measuring its six- and 12-inch sandwiches in order to settle a class-action lawsuit.The moves will be taken after hundreds of customers joined a legal action to complain that their footlong subs were not actually 12 inches long.The legal case began when an Australian teenager posted a photo of one "footlong" sandwich - alongside a ruler that showed it was only actually 11 inches.Subway has now agreed to make sure sandwiches are the correct lengthThe company will also pay 1,000 dollars in compensation to the people who took the case. 
...
